name: ADSI-Cache File Creation By Uncommon Tool
description: Detects the creation of an "Active Directory Schema Cache File" (.sch) file by an uncommon tool.
author: xknow @xknow_infosec, Tim Shelton

detection.condition: selection and not 1 of filter_main_* and not 1 of filter_optional_*

falsepositives: Other legimate tools, which do ADSI (LDAP) operations, e.g. any remoting activity by MMC, Powershell, Windows etc.
